name: Liminal
description: Liminal is a mind-bending puzzle game where every door is a change in perspective and destination.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-7200U CPU @ 2.50GHz (4 CPUs), ~2.7GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 920MX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
